title: Produce Flame
content:
uce Flame can be cast by using the following Items: Scroll of Flame Blade

Cleric, Druid Asmodeus Tiefling

Scroll of Flame Blade

How to Use Produce Flame in BG3

Produce Flame is mainly a utility ability that's used for illuminating an area near the caster that otherwise might be too dark to see. As an added bonus, while this Cantrip is activated, the Druid should find an additional Action in their list aside from the Action to dismiss the flame, called Produce Flame: Hurl.
